title: Mammoth Coolers Cruiser Series, Insulated Hard Ice Chest with Durable Double-Walled Rotomolded Construction, Great for On-The-Go Recreational Activities (Cruiser 25, White)
features: MAMMOTH CRUISER 25 COOLER: Insulated hard ice chest that holds 22 quarts - 28 cans. Created for times when you need to keep plenty food and beverages cold while away from home. Great for softball and soccer tournaments or a day at the pool

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: The double-walled rotomolded construction, freezer grade lid gasket, and built-in stainless steel hinge system of this hard cooler keeps your cans chilled and your lunch from spoiling in the intense heat of a closed-up cab

PORTABLE: Featuring a sturdy metal handle and lightweight size, the ice chest can function as a cooler lunch box. Cooler also has and thick rubber non-skid feet, which prevent unwanted sliding or shifting in the back of a moving truck or rocking boat
SPECS: Outside Measurements - 17.75″ x 11.75″ x 14″ , Inside Measurements 13.9" x 9" x 9.2" , Empty Weight - 11 lbs., Capacity - 22 Quarts, can fit 28 cans, with 3-4 days of ice retention, in White

MAMMOTH COOLERS: The coolest thing since the Ice Age. Molded coolers, soft cooler bags, and tumblers built for the field, the water, the tailgate party, the backyard and more. All backed by a Lifetime Warranty
description: The Mammoth Cruiser 25 is built tough and made to last. It is the ideal size for a day trip. If you are looking for a cooler to take to work, camping, sporting event, tailgate, hunting or fishing this cooler has you covered! Cruisers are equipped with a quality rotating stainless steel handle that makes carrying and transport a breeze. The Cruiser coolers have a superior design, quality parts, outstanding performance all offered at an exceptional value.
Cruiser 25 is perfect for on the go.
Cruiser 25 is perfect for on the go.
